content: make-us-in-one-evening-with-a-great-movie-mitts such an easy pattern you can do it in only one evening open a nice bottle of wine and get started with one of your favorite movies this won t take you any longer … & yarn suggestion needles any worsted yarn will work i used malabrigo merino worsted in frank ochre and polar morn skill level easy size one size materials 60g of worsted weight 4 5mm crochet hook yardage color a 50g color b 10g gauge 17st & 14rows = 10x10cm in single_crochet st finished measurements 19 cm long 9 cm circumference notes single_crochet through back loop of each st around work in continuous rounds do not join or turn unless otherwise instructed © blowfish design 2013 - pattern is for personal use only instructions with color a chain on 30 stitches being careful not to twist slip_stitch in first chained on stitch to join work you will now crochet in the round round 1 single_crochet through back loop of each st around repeat 1 round 21 more times making the thumb hole … round 23 chain 8 stitches skip the next 8 stitches of your work to create the hole for your thumb continue working with single_crochet in back loops round 24 single_crochet through back loop of each st around round 25 single_crochet through back loop in each of the next 4st middle of thumb hole break color a and switch to color b finish round using color b round 26+27 single_crochet through back loop of each st around slip_stitch in first st of round 25 break color b and weave in all ends block lightly if desired enjoy © blowfish design 2013 - pattern is for personal use only
